analysis.description:
CIDCrowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol#220-229) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol#228)

CIDCrowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol#229-271) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol#253-256)
	-token.mint(wal1,wal1Tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol#262-267)
	-token.mint(wal2,wal2Tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol)
	-token.mint(wal3,wal3Tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol)

Reentrancy in CIDCrowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol#229-271):
	External calls:
	- CTS = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol#233)
	- token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol#253-256)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol#256-258)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0x2aea8071b771818e0004d0e5c93fadd9d7f5d31d.sol:
